se.jguru.nazgul.core.quickstart.api.analyzer

Interface NamingStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNamingStrategy

    public interface NamingStrategy
    Specification for how to validate and build Names for use within project structures.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Name createName(org.apache.maven.model.Model model)
      Builds a Name from the supplied Maven Model.
      PomType getPomType(org.apache.maven.model.Model model)
      Retrieves the PomType for the supplied Model.
      boolean isPrefixRequiredOnAllFolders()
      Indicates if folders within a project must use names on the form projectPrefix-projectName-folderName, or if they instead must use the format projectName-folderName.
      void validate(Name aName, PomType pomType)
      Validates the supplied name, throwing an Exception if the validation failed.

    • Method Detail

      • createName

        Name createName(org.apache.maven.model.Model model)
        Builds a Name from the supplied Maven Model.
        Parameters:
        model - A non-null Maven model.
        Returns:
        A Name created from the supplied Model.

      • getPomType

        PomType getPomType(org.apache.maven.model.Model model)
            throws IllegalArgumentException
        Retrieves the PomType for the supplied Model.
        Parameters:
        model - A non-null Maven model.
        Returns:
        The PomType corresponding to the supplied Maven Model.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a PomType could not be found from the supplied model. This implies that the Model did not follow the required naming patterns as implied by this NamingStrategy.

      • validate

        void validate(Name aName,
              PomType pomType)
       throws IllegalArgumentException
        Validates the supplied name, throwing an Exception if the validation failed.
        Parameters:
        aName - The Name to validate.
        pomType - The type of POM which should be validated against the supplied Name.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the name was invalid for the supplied PomType, according to this NamingStrategy.

      • isPrefixRequiredOnAllFolders

        boolean isPrefixRequiredOnAllFolders()
        Indicates if folders within a project must use names on the form projectPrefix-projectName-folderName, or if they instead must use the format projectName-folderName.
        Returns:
        true if all folders are required to have names on the form projectPrefix-projectName-folderName. If false, then folder names should be on the form projectName-folderName instead.
